text: Alain Tanner (6 December 1929 - 11 September 2022) was a Swiss movie director. His first feature movie, was Charles, Dead or Alive (1969). His next two movies, La Salamandre (1971) and Jonah Who Will Be 25 in the Year 2000 (1976) were well received. title: Alain Tanner
